products.name: Lab-Created Ruby Ring
products.description: This romantic ring for her showcases a heart-shaped lab-created ruby embraced in swirls of 14K yellow gold. A duet of round diamonds set in sterling silver lend brilliant contrast to complete the look.

products.name: Natural Sapphire Ring
products.description: Crafted in 10K white gold, this lovely fine jewelry ring showcases oval and round natural sapphires framed by diamonds.

products.name: Created Blue Opal Engagement Ring
products.description: A mesmerizing oval created blue opal is embraced by gentle entwined arms embellished with brilliant round diamonds in this breathtaking women's ring.
